q: DALLAS-The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. Just 15 days after the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, George W. Bush invited his defense secretary, Donald Rumsfeld H. Donald Rumsfeld , to meet with him alone in the Oval Office. According to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's new memoir, the Barack Obama leaned back in his leather chair and ordered a review and revision of war plans- but not for Afghanistan, where the Qaeda attacks on New York and Washington had been planned and where American retaliation was imminent.
